tooltip.cotAtAddress: Change of Technology (COT). TELUS PureFibre is available at this address.
tooltip.fibreFifaAtAddress: Pure Fibre FIFA is available at this address
tooltip.copperFifaAtAddress: Copper FIFA is available at this address
tooltip.fibreFifaAtProduct: Product on FIFA; could be either Fibre or Copper
tooltip.subsReservedStatus: Subscriber number is on hold and ready to be activated on a BAN.
tooltip.subsMovedStatus: Subscriber can't make or receive calls because their number has been transferred to another customer.
tooltip.subsSuspendedStatus: Subscriber can't make or receive calls because their service is temporarily disconnected.
tooltip.subsCancelledStatus: Subscriber can't make or receive calls because their service has been permanently disconnected.
tooltip.mobBanStatusDelinquent: Account is past due and has enterred a predefined collection's treatment path.
tooltip.mobBanStatusCeased: Account has been suspended and sent to Collections.
tooltip.mobBanStatusCancelled: Account has no active subscriber numbers and may or may not have a 0 balance. Account can be reactivated.
tooltip.mobBanStatusTentative: Account has been created but has no active subscriber numbers. Tentative accounts with no reserved subscribers are removed from the system after 6 months from opening date.
tooltip.mobBanStatusSuspended: Subscriber can't make or receive calls because their service is temporarily disconnected.
tooltip.ffhBanStatusInTreatment: Account is past due and has entered a predefined collection's treatment path.

errorPages.unspecified: Something went wrong, please follow the link below to return to Casa.
errorPages.400: Huh? That looks like a bad request.
errorPages.401: Denied! Your login attempt could not be authenticated.
errorPages.403: You do not have permission to access Casa. Stop the monkey business! If you believe you should have access to Casa, please reach out to your support person.
errorPages.404: You do not have permission to access Casa. Stop the monkey business! If you believe you should have access to Casa, please reach out to your support person.
errorPages.500: Internal Server Error. Don't worry, a team of experienced monkeys has been sent to help.
errorPages.502: Bad Gateway. Our server went bananas and your request could not be completed.
errorPages.503: Service Temporarily Unavailable. We will be back from our banana run soon.
errorPages.504: Gateway Time-out. Too much monkeying around.
